video_prompt: "CIVITAI" fades into view as "2022" materializes, its glass-like numbers slowly rotating to reveal golden accents. Gears with a glowing play button and clock hand subtly spin, while a stylized trident symbol pulses with light. A leafy branch unfurls across the foreground, its berries shimmering, as "c29" subtly emerges.
image_prompt:
Generate an image with the word "CIVITAI" in large, luminous, white 3D letters at the top, against a soft grey background. Below it, prominently display large, translucent, glass-like white numbers "2022," with a golden, textured design on parts of the "2" and "0."

To the right of the numbers, include two distinct gear mechanisms: a larger top gear with a light blue-green play button at its center, and a smaller gear below it with a stylized clock hand. Parts of these gears should also be entwined with the golden design.

Below the gears, place a white, glowing trident or stylized branch symbol. At the very bottom, feature the text "c29" in white, overlaid by a dark green branch with leaves and berries, partially covering the symbol and the base of the "2022" numbers. The overall lighting should be soft and even, emphasizing the transparency and reflectivity of the numbers and text.
refined_video_prompt: "CIVITAI" text gently fades into view. "2022" materializes, its glass-like numbers slowly rotating to reveal golden accents. Gears subtly spin, animating a glowing play button and clock hand. A stylized trident symbol pulses with light. In the foreground, a leafy branch unfurls, its berries shimmering as "c29" subtly emerges.
